item.title: CsTIP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: orange1.1g023108 Gene Symbol: CsTIP2|1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: Expression of the citrus CsTIP2|1|CsTIP2|1 gene improves tobacco plant growth, antioxidant capacity and physiological adaptation under stress conditions.

item.title: CYP76C6

item.title: FaGT2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FaGT2 Gene Name: UDP-glucose glucosyltransferase 2 Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: FaGT2: a multifunctional enzyme from strawberry (Fragaria × ananassa) fruits involved in the metabolism of natural and xenobiotic compounds.

item.title: FaGT6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FaGT6 Gene Name: UDP-glucose glucosyltransferase6 Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: Two glucosyltransferases, FaGT6 and FaGT7, were cloned from a strawberry (Fragaria×ananassa) cDNA library and the full-length open reading frames were amplified by rapid amplification of cDNA ends.

item.title: FaGT7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FaGT7 Gene Name: UDP-glucose glucosyltransferase7 Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: Two glucosyltransferases, FaGT6 and FaGT7, were cloned from a strawberry (Fragaria×ananassa) cDNA library and the full-length open reading frames were amplified by rapid amplification of cDNA ends.

item.title: GmSSAcT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.18G258000 Gene Symbol: GmSSAcT1 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Identify and characterize GmSSAcT1, encoding a BADH-type soyasaponin acetyltransferase that catalyzes three or four consecutive acetylations on type-A soyasaponins in vitro and in planta.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb397280 Gene Symbol: GSTZ5 gst61 Gene Name: glutathione S-transferase61 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: HvHOX9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvHOX9 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: Our findings suggest that miR166b/HvHOX9 play a critical role in Al tolerance by decreasing root cell wall Al binding and increasing apoplastic pH for Al detoxification in the root.

item.title: SlE8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc09g089580 Gene Symbol: SlE8|Sl27DOX Gene Name: C-27 hydroxylase Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Induced mutations in SlE8|Sl27DOX and SlACO1 control tomato fruit maturation and shelf-life.

item.title: SlF3HL
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc03g080190 Gene Symbol: SlF3HL Gene Name: Genome: Tomato Genome version SL4.

item.title: SlGLYIII2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc02g081400 Gene Symbol: SlGLYIII2 Gene Name: glyoxalaseIII2 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: A glutathione-independent DJ-1/PfpI domain-containing tomato glyoxalaseIII2, SlGLYIII2, confers enhanced tolerance under salt and osmotic stresses.

item.title: VvNAC72
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: VvNAC72 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: These results demonstrate that grapevine VvNAC72 negatively modulates detoxification of MG through repression of VvGLYI-4, and finally enhances resistance to downy mildew, at least in part, via the modulation of MG-associated ROS homeostasis through a salicylic acid-mediated defense pathway.
